page.title: 11Recreation in Banchory
page.content: Banchory is served by many clubs and societies covering a wide range of activites in sport, music, drama and asssociated with the British Legion Club and local churches and there are various youth organisations such as Girl Guides and Brownies (4 packs of each), scout troups and youth clubs. The local facilities include a golf course,bowling green, tennis courts, cricket ground and several playing fields and parks. The swimming pool in the Secondary School is open to the public on Saturday mornings only. Indoor activities and entertainment are often held in the town halls,church halls, or schools. We asked 4 families about their leisure activities & have listed the results on the next page.
